EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Webinar_Unstructured Data Session 1.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us: Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Unlock the Value of Unstructured Video and Image Data Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Join us for our webinar series on the first Thursday of every month. "What You Can Do With Hadoop" Webinar series will contain both technical and business topics, use cases, thought leadership from industry experts, customer examples and more. Our next webinar – Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop – is scheduled for Thursday, September 5, 2013 at 9 AM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredData_Session1_Register.html> and 7PM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredDataSession2_Register.html> respectively. Join us to learn about:
- New and emerging trends for unstructured data - Video Analytics on Hadoop - Analytics by SQL - Pivotal Data Science Lab services
Register today for the 9 AM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredData_Session1_Register.html> Register today for the 7 PM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredDataSession2_Register.html>
Thank you, The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
Manage your subscription preferences >> http://play.gopivotal.com/CommercialSubscription.html or unsubscribe >> http://play.gopivotal.com/UnsubscribePage.html.
